mapper.insert:
insert into battle_room(br_num, br_subject, br_pw, q_type, br_cnt, br_point, u_id, br_people, br_gamestate) values('BR'||LPAD((seq_br_num.nextVal),4,'0'),#{br_subject},#{br_pw},#{q_type},#{br_cnt}, #{br_point}, #{u_id}, 1, 'N')
select 'BR'||LPAD((seq_br_num.currVal),4,'0') from dual
insert into battle_play(br_num, q_type, user01, user02, bp_01cnt, bp_02cnt, bp_count, bp_state) values(#{br_num},#{q_type},#{u_id},'',0,0,#{br_cnt},0)
mapper.select: select br_num, br_subject, br_pw, decode (q_type, 'A', '연예', 'B','넌센스','C','상식','D','아재') as q_type, br_cnt, br_point, u_id, br_people, br_gamestate from battle_room order by br_gamestate, br_num
